briefTitle: Association of Tumour Grade and Sex Steroid Receptor as a Prognostic Index in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Association of Tumour Grade and Sex Steroid Receptor as a Prognostic Index in Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients diagnosed with breast cancer irrespective of age, gender and clinical stage

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any patient who lost to follow up
